dc:title: On Pilgrimage - July/August 1973
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: "I must write about prayer because it is as necessary to life as breathing." Enumerates several forms of prayer: reading as prayer, the psalms, scriptural prayers of faith, hope and charity, and praying for and to those who have died.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 532 1973-07-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
